description:
Yuka`s class is having an extracurricular lesson today. Chi-chan and the gang joins her for a day gathering plants on Kappa Mountain. Suo-kun insists that there are kappas on Kappa Mountain, so they all go looking for one...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shock! We Run Into You-Know-Who on the Mountain!
Shougeki! Yama de Aitsu ni Souguu Dechi!
ショーゲキ! 山でアイツにそうぐうでち!
